summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from February 1, 2018, to February 28, 2018. It details the account balance, transactions including transfers and interest payments, and provides information on how to address errors in the statement.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3 St, Thonlas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance as of February 1, 2018, was $6,096,966.11.
A transfer of $2,000,000.00 occurred on February 12, 2018.
An interest payment of $4,494.74 was credited on February 28, 2018.
The ending balance as of February 28, 2018, was $4,101,460.85.
The document includes instructions for addressing errors in the account statement.
